recommendations: Stacey Harris
Digital Marketing Strategist and Trainer for online entrepreneurs ready to build communities around their message.
August 12, 2015, Stacey was a client of Brandy’s

I recently watched Brandy's Google Analytics training series and it was a powerful tool for my team and I to get SUPER clear on how to start using these. After months of being frustrated by getting in and having to dig through Spam we now have simple and clear emails sent directly to my inbox so I can make marketing decisions based on clear facts. Brandy is a fantastic resource for everything when it comes to marketing and technology coming together. She makes it clear, easy to use, and what I needed, not what was newest on the market. Through talking with her we actually ended up shifting a system and saving nearly $150 per month which I can much more effectively spend elsewhere.I highly recommend setting up a time to talk with Brandy Lawson.

summary: Business owners hire me as their Chief Online Officer because most are, unintentionally, hiding from Google, can't convert clicks to income and likely 1-click away from getting hacked.As a Digital Marketer Certified Partner with more than 2 decades of experience in business and technology, I help clients with simple, innovative automations, create an irresistible online presence and secure their digital assets to get them the RIGHT clients, more money and more freedom.I help your business do digital right.🔥 You've got way better things to do than chase after partners who don't do what they say they are going to do, or invest in projects and services that don't produce results for your business. I start with a strategy directly connected to your business objectives for a "perfect fit" every time.🔥 I work directly with business owners who are, or are trying to be, the CEOs of their company. I LOVE to see the "light bulb" moments first hand when a problem is solved and results get delivered.🔥 When I talk about it, you'll get it. Tech-related topics can be intimidating or worse, watch-paint-dry snooze-fests. Ugh! That’s not fun, and certainly not engaging enough to be useful. I bring my marketing & tech genius in a plain English, no-judgement wrapper that educates and entertains audiences. Attendees leave my talks grinning and ready with at least a handful of strategies, tips or tricks to implement immediately in their business.Get in touch -->brandy@brandylawson.comTwitter: @thefieryfxSchedule a 15 minute call: http://chat.brandylawson.comOther things I do well:► KPIs, Metrics & Analytics► Google Analytics► WordPress Website Site Care & Security► Digital Optimization► Helming a speedboat► Business Automation► Digital Strategies► Marketing Strategy► Killer Analogies► Wearing Heels► Mobile► SEO
name: Brandy (Hageman) Lawson
